name: Apple Filing Protocol Location
summary: Learn about .AFPLOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AFPLOC files are opened by the Apple Finder, which is part of the Mac OS X operating system.

description: Contains the location of a system that can be accessed via an Apple Filing Protocol (AFP) connection; stores the location, such as an IP address, in an XML format; provides one-click access to a server or other machine on a network.
